name: GoCoordinator
summary: A framework that offers robust and extensible interactions between Coordinators and ViewControllers.
description: GoCoordinator provides the tools to create your own Coordinators and link them to ViewControllers. Coordinators are compatible with both Nibs and Storyboards, and can instantiate and inject controllers into complex view hierarchies. ViewControllers can talk to their Coordinators via the "go" extension.
